job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Looking for a Data Scientist to work with financial data on a great team and a fantastic organization! You can work remotely but would prefer someone in the Tampa Bay area!Â This role will support multiple divisions within the organization. The focus of this role includes using data to develop and deliver the information necessary for making business decisions and providing actionable intelligence that allows senior management to better manage the business.Â This person should be able to interpret data, analyzing results using various techniques and extracting information which can offer ways to improve products and business approaches thus influencing business decisions. You will lead projects, including communications with IT as well as key business stakeholders.Â You will provide the sales leaders data they need to guide the business from models built based on current statistics.Requirements:Prefer 3-5 years using data to build models to provide to business leaders but will consider those with 1-2 years of data science experience as well.Familiarity with statistical modeling techniquesFamiliarity with statistical and general programming languages such as R and/or Python (Python preferred)Must have solid SQL experienceÂ Â Customer centric analysis, profitability analysis and modelingBachelorâs degree Required, Masters a plusAble to work independently with minimum supervision.Â Â Â Able to maintain confidentiality of sensitive informationÂ Â Â Â Â Â Prefer someone who lives in Tampa Bay areaMUST LIVE IN THE ET OR CT TIME ZONES.No 3rd parties, no sponsorship available
